I FOCUS IN

Medicine as well as creating "out of this world" predictions and unbelievable advices for living and non-living things

ADVISING

The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. I cannot teach anybody anything, I can only make them think. Beware the barrenness of a busy life.

MEDICINE

Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle. Courage is knowing what not to fear. Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.

PREDICTION

Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all. We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

MANIPULATION

Every man is the architect of his own future. Necessity makes the timid brave. Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay.
